page.title: 20Transport
page.content: Most people own a car or have the use of one. Motorcycles and bicycles provide transport for the young and fit. A private bus operator runs a bus on weekdays between Bromyard and Worcester via Acton Green, known as the workers' bus. There is a bus to Worcester on Saturdays from Bishops Frome. On Thursdays a bus runs from Bromyard through Acton Green to Ridgeway Cross. Milk, bread, fish are delivered, but only once or twice a week. There is a mobile shop, and coal, fuel oil, gas. and firewood, are delivered as required. Milk is collected daily from the farms by tanker. Other farm produce and raw materials are delivered to and from farms by lorries, the ever increasing size of which causes dismay to other road users. As one elderly resident said 'everything comes from away'.
